alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 29 at 5:53AM EDT until July 29 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 564 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 AM EDT THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN OHIO THIS WATCH INCLUDES 16 COUNTIES IN NORTH CENTRAL OHIO ASHLAND KNOX LORAIN RICHLAND IN NORTHEAST OHIO ASHTABULA CUYAHOGA GEAUGA HOLMES LAKE MAHONING MEDINA PORTAGE STARK SUMMIT TRUMBULL WAYNE IN PENNSYLVANIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN NORTHWEST PENNSYLVANIA CRAWFORD THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AKRON, ALLIANCE, ASHLAND, ASHTABULA, AURORA, AUSTINTOWN, AVON LAKE, BAINBRIDGE, BOARDMAN, BRUNSWICK, BURTON, CANTON, CHARDON, CHESTERLAND, CLEVELAND, CONNEAUT, EASTLAKE, ELYRIA, GENEVA, KENT, KILLBUCK, LORAIN, MANSFIELD, MASSILLON, MEADVILLE, MEDINA, MENTOR, MIDDLEFIELD, MILLERSBURG, MOUNT VERNON, NILES, NORTH RIDGEVILLE, ORRVILLE, PAINESVILLE, RAVENNA, RITTMAN, SOUTH RUSSELL, STREETSBORO, TITUSVILLE, WADSWORTH, WARREN, WICKLIFFE, WILLOUGHBY, WILLOWICK, WOOSTER, AND YOUNGSTOWN.
